Method.name: GetSourceControlProperty
Method.Description: Gets a property that is set in ^SourceControl

Method.name: IsProjectDirSet
Method.Description: Checks if ^SourceControl("projectDir") is set It is normally set just by running ANT.

Method.name: GetProjectDir
Method.Description: Get the file system directory where all files should be written to
Method.Implementation:
set result = ..GetSourceControlProperty("projectDir") if (result = "") { write !, "Before using Source Control you must update Cache Variables!" write !, "Please run ant on you project directory before using this Source Control Class" write !, "(set ^SourceControl(""projectDir"")=""c:\yourproject"")" set result = "c:\tmp" }
quit result

Method.name: GetCspDir
Method.Description: Get the file system directory where cache reads the csp files

Method.name: IsOnBeforeLoadActive
Method.Description: If the property is set, Studio will always try to load a file from the file system, whenever the user choses a file in Studio's open dialog.

Method.name: IsDeleteTmpXMLFilesActive
Method.Description: Tests if the system must delete the temporary file created during the export of a file. It deafults to YES

Method.name: IsInIgnoredList
Method.Description: Tests to see if this internal artifact is in any ignored lists

Method.name: IsInExcludeExceptions
Method.Description: The exclude excpetion list lists all artifacts that should *not* be ignored

Method.name: GetExternalIncDir
Method.Description: The place where .inc.xml files are saved

Method.name: GetExternalMacDir
Method.Description: The place where .mac.xml files are saved

Method.name: GetExternalPrjDir
Method.Description: The place where .prj.xml files are saved

Method.name: GetExternalClassDir
Method.Description: The place where .CLS.XML files are saved

Method.name: GetExternalCSPDir
Method.Description: The place where .CSP, .CSR, JS,CSS and XML files (which are directly manipulated by Stui) are saved

Method.name: GetExternalNMFormDir
Method.Description: Get the external full path to the @NM forms directory Example: c:\myprojects\alphalincA\Implementation\globals\nm\forms\

Method.name: GetExternalNMClassDir
Method.Description: Get the external full path to the @NM class directory Example: c:\myprojects\alphalincA\Implementation\globals\nm\classes\

Method.name: GetExternalNMSysParametersDir
Method.Description: Get the external full path to the @NM system parameters Example: c:\myprojects\alphalincA\Implementation\globals\nm\sysParameters\

Method.name: GetExternalNMAppParametersDir
Method.Description: Get the external full path to the @NM application parameters Example: c:\myprojects\alphalincA\Implementation\globals\nm\appParameters\

Method.name: GetExternalNMUserParametersDir
Method.Description: Get the external full path to the @NM user parameters Example: c:\myprojects\alphalincA\Implementation\globals\nm\userParameters\

Method.name: GetExternalNMMenuDir
Method.Description: Get the external full path to the @NM Menu definitions Example: c:\myprojects\alphalincA\Implementation\globals\nm\menu\

Method.name: GetExternalNMLanguageDir
Method.Description: Get the external full path to the @NM language texts Example: c:\myprojects\alphalincA\Implementation\globals\nm\language\

Method.name: GetExternalNMHelpDir
Method.Description: Get the external full path to the @NM help texts. Example: c:\myprojects\alphalincA\Implementation\globals\nm\help\

Method.name: GetExternalNMDictionaryDir
Method.Description: Get the external full path to the @NM dictionary texts. Example: c:\myprojects\alphalincA\Implementation\globals\nm\dictionary\

Method.name: GetExternalNMCharParametersDir
Method.Description: Get the external full path to the @NM dictionary texts. Example: c:\myprojects\alphalincA\Implementation\globals\nm\charParameters\

Method.name: GetExternalNMGeneralMetadataDir
Method.Description: Get the external full path to the @NM general metadata Example: c:\myprojects\alphalincA\Implementation\globals\nm\charParameters\

Method.name: GetExternalNMFavoritesDir
Method.Description: Get the external full path to the @NM general metadata Example: c:\myprojects\alphalincA\Implementation\globals\nm\favorites\

Method.name: GetExternalResourcesDir
Method.Description: Get the external full path to the resources Example: c:\myprojects\alphalincA\Implementation\web\resources\

Method.name: GetExternalReportDefinitionsDir
Method.Description: Get the external full path to the report definitions Example: c:\myprojects\alphalincA\Implementation\web\reports\

Method.name: GetExternalCompiledReportsDir
Method.Description: Get the external full path to the compiled reports Example: c:\myprojects\alphalincA\Implementation\web\reports\Compiled\

Method.name: GetExternalCacheLibraryDir
Method.Description: Get the external full path to the CachÃ© library Example: c:\myprojects\alphalincA\Implementation\libs\cache-libs

Method.name: GetExternalJavaLibraryDir
Method.Description: Get the external full path to the Java library Example: c:\myprojects\alphalincA\Implementation\libs\java-libs

Method.name: IsBuildOnlyNonVAR
Method.Description: Verify configuration setting allowing only non-VAR files to be exported

Method.name: IsBuildOnlyVAR
Method.Description: Verify configuration setting allowing only non-VAR files to be exported

Method.name: IsBuildASDE
Method.Description: Verify configuration setting allowing ASDE files to be exported

Method.name: IsRunSourceLogging
Method.Description: Verify configuration setting to run SourceLogging
